title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, July 29, 2021
description: Poet Stanley Kunitz was born on this day in 1905 in in Worcester, Massachusetts. He was appointed the poet laureate of the United States when he was 95 years old.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Poet Stanley Kunitz was born on this day in 1905 in in Worcester, Massachusetts. He was appointed the poet laureate of the United States when he was 95 years old.
